title: Spoon Oba-san
alternative_title: Mrs. Pepperpot, Old-Lady Spoon, Spoon Obasan, スプーンおばさん
description: An older woman wears a small spoon around her neck but every now and then, she shrinks to the size of a mouse because of the spoon. She sees the world then from a completely different perspective and has all kind of strange adventures together with Wendy, the mouse and many others.
